title: Am I the only one who thinks lethality is broken?
body: Honestly, lethality has caused such problems within the meta recently. Because lethality is too strong, we now have a tank meta, and because of the tank meta (and other crit items/warlords) there becomes a need for crit adcs. It's stupid how you are allowed to completely botch laning phase than get that stupid fucking BC + GB + DB core and bam, magically you fuck over everyone else.

replies.body: Lethality is so broken that it made a tank meta leading to an adc meta to such an extend that lethality champions aren't even played in most of the games{{sticker:vayne-pose}}
I mean it seems pretty logical to me. Assassins will never be played in pro play other than LeBlanc because their kits fucking suck and they get shit on by tanks.

I dunno... when I run heavy armor runes, and I am vs a Zed in top lane as Orn, he has dirk, I have tabi (equal gold spent) he is still chunking 1/3 of my health if he manages to land 2 shurikens at level 5...
I mean if he's playing zed top against a tank I think that says something else entirely
Look at crit! Then say lethality is overpowered.
Assasins are supposed to oneshtot us. You can't expect to go 1v1 with azir vs zed and win. On the other hand They have mostly bad lategame, they are mechanicly harder and often useless.
Lethality isn't broken. {{item:3147}}  is broken. {{champion:91}}  is broken. Everything else is fine.

No. Lethality is not broken nor is it a problem. Reason why we have so many tanks is because of Ardent Censer supports we have hyper carries. And hyper carries need protection from tanks. Lethality is countered by disengage supports, not by tanks. Also Lethality got nerfed in 7.14 hotfix and 7.15. Its not that popular anymore. It was broken for 2 days
